channel.title: tools on deskriders
channel.description: Recent content in tools on deskriders

item.title: Installing Tortoise TTS
item.description: These instructions are only tested on macOS and valid on 1st of January 2023. git clone https://github.com/neonbjb/tortoise-tts.git cd tortoise-tts python3.9 -m venv venv source venv/bin/activate pip install torch torchvision python3.9 setup.py install pip uninstall numpy pip install numba pip uninstall threadpoolctl pip install scikit-learn==1.2.0 # Rerunning due to failures in the previous step because on mismatched versions python3.9 setup.py install pip install torchaudio python tortoise/do_tts.py --text "I'm going to speak this" --voice random --preset fast ls -l results open results/random_0_0.

item.title: JSON Command line power tools
item.description: JQ :: command-line JSON processor https://stedolan.github.io/jq/ Tutorial Cheatsheet JTab :: Json data as a formatted table https://github.com/wlezzar/jtab gron :: Make JSON greppable https://github.com/tomnomnom/gron fx (Function eXecution) :: Interactive JSON Viewer https://github.com/antonmedv/fx
